sidecarMarketingCard.title: About HCP Waypoint
sidecarMarketingCard.subtitle: Use HCP Waypoint to create reusable infrastructure configurations that enable developers to create their applications from Waypoint templates and enhance them with additional functionality with Waypoint add-ons.

sidecarHcpCallout.heading: HCP Waypoint
sidecarHcpCallout.description: Simplify your application deployments across platforms
